caption: Relating to the transfer of the licensing and regulation of charitable bingo to the Texas Commission of Licensing and Regulation.
last_action: 05/02/2025 H Referred to Licensing & Administrative Procedures: May  2 2025  2:03PM
summary: This bill transfers the regulation of charitable bingo from the Texas Lottery Commission to the Texas Department of Licensing and Regulation (TDLR), effective September 1, 2026. The bill does not specifically target Chinese immigrants or have any direct impact on Chinese nationals or Chinese Americans. It is primarily an administrative reorganization of bingo regulation between state agencies.
translation: 该法案将慈善宾果游戏的监管权从德克萨斯州彩票委员会转移到德克萨斯州许可和监管部门，于2026年9月1日生效。该法案并未特别针对中国移民，也不会对中国公民或美籍华人产生任何直接影响。这主要是州政府机构之间对宾果游戏监管的行政重组。
committees:
1. State Affairs Committee
2. Licensing Administrative Procedures Committee
3. Government Operations Committee
